name: Terrakotta
headline: AI platform for phone-first sellers
description: Terrakotta is a power-dialer that lets sales reps leave AI-generated voicemails.  Our first customers are Commercial Real Estate brokerages that use Terrakotta to clone their brokers voices, dial prospects and when no one answers, leave an A/B tested, personalized voicemail that gets a callback.
tags: industry:real-estate; industry:sales; industry:telecommunications; industry:home-services; industry:conversational-ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Vincent Wilson, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ Terrakotta. Vincent studied CS at the University of Washington and was an incoming FDSE at Palantir before he dropped out to found Terrakotta.

founders.name: Kusiima Boswell, Founder
founders.description: Kusiima is the co-founder and CPO of Terrakotta. Before Terrakotta, he studied business and CS at the University of Pennsylvania (Wharton & Penn Engineering). In his senior year, Kusiima built and trained a ML model that correctly predicted stock price increases/decreases with 65% accuracy. After Penn, Kusiima joined McKinsey & Company where he wrote custom data solutions for $10B+ technology companies, worked directly with execs to create GTM strategies, and led private equity due diligence.

founders.name: Gabriel Wilson, Founder
founders.description: I'm one of the founders of Terrakotta. Before building Terrakotta, I was obsessed with scaling peer to peer networks. By day, I was a SWE at Lyft where I wrote code that powered millions of rides and by night I built StoreStash a profitable gig economy storage platform. Now I'm all in on AI voice because our sales engagement platform will connect millions of people with the right message at the right time.

generated_description:
**Terrakotta: AI-Powered Deal-Making for Sales Professionals**

Founded in 2023 and hailing from the heart of San Francisco, Terrakotta is the brainchild of a small but ambitious team of three. They’re crafting an AI platform specifically tailored for phone-first sellers, particularly within the commercial real estate sector. Think of them as the sales automation tool that brings the human touch back to cold calls—but with an impressive tech twist.

Initially launched as a power-dialer, Terrakotta lets sales representatives leave AI-generated voicemails that can mirror the voice of the brokers they represent. This innovative approach allows sales teams to engage prospects through personalized, A/B tested messages that are designed to increase callback rates. Their early adopters, notably brokerages like Cushman & Wakefield and JLL, have found success in utilizing this technology to broaden their outreach and enhance their efficiency.

Being part of Y Combinator’s W24 batch, Terrakotta is backed by a community echoing innovation and growth. They’ve smartly positioned themselves at the intersection of real estate, sales, telecommunications, and conversational AI—places where meaningful conversations can lead to significant deals.

**Core Features:**

- **Voice Cloning**: Create a digital voice twin to engage with prospects dynamically.
- **AI-Generated Voicemails**: Leave tailored messages that resonate personally with potential clients.
- **Integration Capabilities**: Sync effortlessly with tools like Salesforce and HubSpot, making it easier to process leads and follow-ups.
- **Performance Metrics**: Boost productivity with features that help sales teams track their effectiveness in real-time.

The product is not just a fancy gimmick; testimonials from satisfied users underscore its transformative impact on their workflows. From closing deals worth over $1 million to dramatically increasing call volumes, users are finding ways to make the most out of Terrakotta’s offerings.

In a nutshell, Terrakotta is shaking up the traditional sales approach with AI and voice technology. Their mission? To empower sellers with tools that help them connect, converse, and convert—fast. If you want to learn more or explore their platform, visit [Terrakotta’s website](https://www.terrakotta.ai/). 

As sales evolve and technology continues to seep into every aspect of business interaction, keeping close tabs on companies like Terrakotta might be wise—they're not just a tool; they're a glimpse into the future of sales communications.
